(ATTENTION: 

Yanshosh/Zardus gets to drive in 13 days!  Do your duty as a human being!  
Send a letter to the mayor of Tuscon, Arizona, and tell him not to let Yan 
get his drivers lisence!  Sending a letter of the same type to the governor 
of Arizona wouldn't hurt either!  Do what you have to do!)

Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor (gestalt)/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Vehement/Chordate:




Oblitertron lay on his back, Defensor still on top of him.  "ENOUGH!" he 
coughed up, grabbing Defensor and pushing him unwittingly into the shots 
fired by Omega Boost and Megabot.  He sent a knee into Defensor's abdomen, 
the grip on his neck loosening greatly and the punches stopping.  

---

Defensor let out a yell of pain as the numerous laser blasts he was pushed 
into seared into his armored form.  The hit to the abdomen hurt as well, and 
he eased his grip on his opponents neck, trying to cope with the pain.  
Another knee to the abdomen hurt even more, and he let out a grunt of pain.

---

Dark Wolf raised his sword, firing off a missile blade into a side of the 
Cybertronian Fire, followed up by three rapid optic blasts.

---

Nemesis Enforcer picked up Angel Prime and Prowl on his scanners.  "Heh heh." 
he chuckled (in a laugh similar to the thespian Christopher Lambert's), 
flying forward at top speed, the ball of energy form Angel Prime missing. 

Nemesis moved the launcher to the side, firing off a rocket at Prowl.  He 
then lifted his head up, firing off ten rapid optic blasts up at Angel Prime.

---

Scattershot watched with interest.  "Myah, ganging up on the man, eh?  
Where's your Messiah now, myah?" he raised his rifle, firing off twenty-five 
explosive rounds at Angel Prime's knees.

---

Vehement raised both arms, firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles 
at Hot Rod, one heading for his chest, the other his left knee.

==

Chordate felt the CF shake, and checked the scanners.  "Hull at 76%." he said 
aloud.
